name: omni-agent-monorepo
description: Professional multi-provider agent orchestration library and runtime.

scripts.build: npm run build -w @omni-agent/core && npm run build -w @omni-agent/providers && npm run build -w @omni-agent/tools && npm run build -w @omni-agent/cli && npm run build -w @omni-agent/webmcp
scripts.test: npm run test -w @omni-agent/providers --if-present && npm run test -w @omni-agent/tools --if-present
